% A LaTex Template for generating Team Care Arrangements Fax Back consent form for Australian General Practitioners
%% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{report}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{multicol}
\usepackage{supertabular}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage[a4paper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=0.5cm,bmargin=0.6cm,lmargin=0.5cm,rmargin=0.5cm}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{3}
\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}
\setlength{\parskip}{\medskipamount}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\usepackage{array}
\makeatletter
\DeclareRobustCommand{\checkbox}{\framebox(5,5){$\bullet$}}
\DeclareRobustCommand{\emptycheckbox}{\framebox(5,5){}}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{5.5cm}>{\centering}p{8cm}>{\raggedright}p{4cm}}
  \textbf{!clinic-name}\\
  !clinic-branch \\
  !clinic-street \\
  !clinic-suburb\\
  Phone:!clinic-phone\\
  Fax  :!clinic-fax\\
  Date :!date
     & \textbf{TEAM CARE ARRANGEMENT\\Consent to Participation
      } &
 \textbf{!name} \\
 !street \\
 !suburb \\
 !birthdate !age\\
 !medicare !card-position\\
 !patient-phone
 !patient-mobile}
\\
\end{tabular}

!provider \\
Dear !fname-provider,\\

Are you willing to take on  !firstname for treatment under the Chronic Disease Management Plan. If so could you 
sign this form and fax it back to us on !clinic-fax.
\\\\
Consent for treament		Yes/No
\\\\\\
Your Signed Consent         ..............................
\\\\\\
Thanking you
\\\\
\text{Yours Sincerely}\\\\\\

!practitioner-name \\ 
!provider-no\\
\hrule
\hrule

\text{I, !patient-name-horizontal, have agreed to this Team Care Arrangement}
\\\\\\\\\
\text{Patient Signature:}


\end{document}
